info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 28 at 5:20AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF LAKE EFFECT SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF ERIE... WYOMING...AND GENESEE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of lake effect snow will drift south across the Buffalo Metro area and Wyoming County early this morning. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...A band of lake effect snow from Lake Huron will continue to drift south across the Buffalo Metro area early this morning. Snowfall amounts will be minor, with most areas seeing a fresh inch or so. Roads will be snow covered and slippery early this morning, and visibility will be reduced at times. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Buffalo Metro Area, Grand Island, Bennington, Warsaw, and Darien. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 57 and 49. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
